      • RunEpoch

        public double RunEpoch(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> input,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> output)
        Description copied from interface: ISupervisedLearning
        Runs learning epoch. Epoch = In training a neural net, the term epoch is used to describe a complete pass through all of the training patterns. The weights in the neural net may be updated after each pattern is presented to the net, or they may be updated just once at the end of the epoch. Frequently used as a measure of speed of learning - as in "training was complete after x epochs".
        Specified by:
        RunEpoch in interface ISupervisedLearning
        Parameters:
        input - Array of input vectors.
        output - Array of output vectors.
        Returns:
        Returns sum of learning errors.
